    • GodrickTheGrafted

      public GodrickTheGrafted(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap spawningMap)
      GodrickTheGrafted Constructor. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes. Sets despawning chance to be 0% as boss cannot despawn.
      Parameters:
      spawningMap - : The GameMap in which Godrick The Grafted spawns.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, checks HP to determine which stage the Boss is currently in. If <= 50% of his HP, remove the Axe of Godrick and replace it with a Grafted Dragon WeaponItem in its inventory. Calls the super.playTurn after the phase checks to initiate its turn.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      actions - : Collection of possible Actions for this Enemy.
      lastAction - : The Action this Enemy took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction().
      map - : The map containing the Enemy.
      display - : The I/O object to which messages may be written.
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found.

    • reset

      public void reset(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      A method to remove the Enemy from the Game Map once Player rests or dies. Godrick will not be removed, instead be moved back to its spawning Location with full health.
      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      Overrides:
      reset in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      map - : The Game Map.
      location - : THe location of the Last Site of Lost Grace the Player rested at.
